title.narrative: Community-based market monitoring in the Darfur region of Sudan Phase 3

description.narrative: To strengthen the capacity of Sudanese civil society organisations to carry out market monitoring and analysis, and to engage with government and other key actors to influence how livelihoods are supported.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Sudan

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Sudan

description.narrative: North Darfur, West Darfur, Central Darfur, East Darfur and South Darfur.

title.narrative: Ability of staff to produce high quality market information documents to meet increasing demand

title.narrative: Ability of staff to produce high quality market information documents to meet increasing demand

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

target.value: Improved quality and distribution of information to better understand market functions, needs and linkages.

comment.narrative: Improved quality and distribution of information to better understand market functions, needs and linkages.

actual.value: Collection of data from 73 markets achieved. Capacity building accross staff and CBOs successfull. Quality greatly improved
